headlines_1.description: Malgudi's name may have been inspired by a fictional South Indian town from the writings of R.K. Narayan, but its flavours are the real deal. This re...

headlines_2.description: Omulab's eggs-tensive menu keeps the yolks coming: Omurice (omelette with fried rice) is the top temptation, offered in a range of thoughtful...

headlines_3.name: Supperclub, TREC: New Year's Menu
headlines_3.description: Ring in the new year with a remarkable meal: Our best bet for the final dinner of 2017 or the first for 2018 is Supperclub, which French che...

headlines_4.name: Hachi Bakery Cafe
headlines_4.description: For over a decade, Chinami Date honed her skills at bakeries in Osaka and Singapore, working toward her dream of someday running her own ...

headlines_5.name: Potter's Cafe @ Petaling Jaya
headlines_5.description: Cakes, coffee and tea in a friendly art gallery, discreetly tucked away from the urban bustle: Potter's Cafe is one of PJ's pleasant little secrets t...

headlines_6.name: Mikey's New York Pizza: Chizza What? Chizza Who?
headlines_6.description: From a Rainbow Pizza with a base of many colours, crowned with puffy clouds of ricotta cheese, to a Devi's Tandoori Pizza topped with clay-oven...

headlines_7.name: Raintree
headlines_7.description: Sprouting up recently inside Menara CIMB, Raintree is a fresh oasis for Thai and Western cooking, blending both with a vibrant, feel-good perkiness. ...

headlines_8.name: Milligram: 2018 Menu
headlines_8.description: There's a seemingly effortless charm to this cafe that has made it a neighbourhood favourite in Taman Mayang Jaya for more than three years now. But ...

headlines_9.name: Yatra
headlines_9.description: Fans of South Indian fare can make a pilgrimage to Yatra, where the vegetarian biryani thali set is a totally satisfying spread for RM15, complete wi...

headlines_10.name: Aiola, Graz, Austria
headlines_10.description: Grazing in Graz - perched on the Styrian capital's Schlossberg hill, Aiola makes it clear why Graz has been named 'City of Culinary Delights.' A menu...

headlines_11.name: The Prep Room: 2018 Menu
headlines_11.description: The last time we visited The Prep Room this year, we chatted with the cafe's founding couple, Kuan Ling and Zaki, about the triumphs and trials of ru...

headlines_12.name: Leib, Tallinn, Estonia
headlines_12.description: Nestled in a verdant garden, Leib makes lovely, soulful use of what Estonia's hard-toiling farmers have cultivated and harvested - the menu is an ear...

headlines_13.name: Babe: New Fun Dining Menu
headlines_13.description: Recently marking its second birthday, Babe is maturing into a restaurant that's proficient beyond its years, but it hasn't lost its sense of buoyant, young-at-heart playfulness.

headlines_14.name: The Hermitage
headlines_14.description: Egg-omaniacs can break out of their shells at The Hermitage, where the yolk is truly on us.

headlines_15.name: ROYCE' Malaysia 2017 Christmas Collection
headlines_15.description: Throughout December, ROYCE' is spreading the Christmas merriment with its latest selection of beautifully curated chocolates and cookies for this special season.

headlines_16.name: Wondermama: New Wonder Tapas Menu
headlines_16.description: Has it been more than half a decade already since Wondermama first opened, bringing its own playful brand of Asian comfort food to Bangsar Village? The team here continues to find new ways to keep things intriguing for customers, recently launching a Wonder Tapas menu that's poised to be crowd-pleasing, available both in Bangsar and 1 Utama.

headlines_17.name: Taketei
headlines_17.description: Taman Desa's latest spot for Japanese soul food mainly tackles ramen - the Jiro Ramen (RM16.

headlines_18.name: Taste Fiji Kitchen
headlines_18.description: One of Fiji's best contemporary cafes, Taste Fiji Kitchen pays homage to this South Pacific nation's produce with creations like bay herb salads; ota wild ferns with shredded coconuts and sauteed chicken liver, Votualevu free-range eggs with root crop crisps; prawns with green papayas, braised Yaqara beef cheeks with garlic mash and tempura okra; and caramelised Vuda pork belly with moca spinach.

headlines_19.name: La Carne by Kopimeo
headlines_19.description: Meat and bread, the basic building blocks of many meals, form the foundation of La Carne, which means ‘meat’ in Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, and apparently, Shah Alamese.

headlines_20.name: Tiffin Food Court: Postponed with Immediate Effect
headlines_20.description: KELANA JAYA, 8 Dec 2017 — Tiffin Food Court, the experiential food event that is scheduled to take place in the 30,000 sq ft disused warehouse in the Sungai Way Free Trade Industrial Zone will be postponed until further notice.

headlines_21.name: The Vertical Cafe
headlines_21.description: At an elevation of 3,842 metres, the summit of Mont Blanc'sAiguille du Midi is most often freezing - a cup of hot chocolate spiked with rum is the prescribed antidote to counter the cold before taking in the high-altitude panorama of glacier routes.

headlines_22.name: Wine & Cheese Bistro
headlines_22.description: There's no mystery to what's offered here: Bottles of vino and platters of formaggio.

headlines_23.name: Mikro
headlines_23.description: There's nothing like a neighbourhood cafe run by residents who know these surroundings intimately.

headlines_24.name: Flower Girl Coffee
headlines_24.description: Springtime has come for restaurant enthusiasts at Sunway Geo Avenue, where many new eateries have sprouted recently.
